Umbeehosting’s VPS hosting products are designed to meet the most demanding hosting requirements and customer needs with maximum security and reliability. Our VPS servers incorporate high end VPS hosting features such as:


  • Same Day Setup
  • vePortal Control Panel

  • 24/7 Technical support
  • Latest Centos, Gentoo, Ubuntu, Fedora, Debian
  • 2 Static IP addresses
  • Directadmin $9.95/month
  • cPanel $14.95/month
  • Secure US Datacentre
